query: Set an alarm at 4:30 PM on Thursdays for my online meeting.
I need a reminder to pick up the dry cleaning every Friday at 5 PM.
Set a timer for my laundry in 1 hour, ideally with no user interface popping up.
I need to time my 5-minute presentation; please set a timer and skip any UI if possible.
If I want to disable an alarm, how can I quickly find the list of all my alarms?
What alarms do I have set that remind me of daily tasks? Can I see them?
I'm looking to reach out to my family members only; how can I select them from my contacts effectively?

mime.CommonDataKinds.Phone.CONTENT_TYPE: Pick from contacts with a phone number.
mime.CommonDataKinds.Email.CONTENT_TYPE: Pick from contacts with an email address.

query: I need to quickly select a contact to send them an image. How can I do that?
I need to email my professor about a project. How can I select their email address from my contacts without scrolling too much?
What do I do if I can't recall my coworker's phone number? Can you assist me in picking it?
I'd like to send a thank-you email to my hiring manager after an interview. His email is hiringmanager@example.com. How should I do this?

extras.EXTRA_TEXT:
Dear Hiring Manager,

Thank you for the opportunity to interview for the position. I appreciate your time and consideration.

Best regards,
[Your Name]

query: How can I send a farewell email to my colleagues who I worked with for years? His email is colleagues@example.com.

extras.Intent.EXTRA_TEXT:
Dear colleagues,

As I move on to new adventures, I want to take a moment to express my gratitude for all the wonderful years we spent working together. I will cherish the memories we've created.

Wishing you all the best in the future.

Warm regards,
[Your Name]

query: I need to upload a set of images from a recent trip. Is it possible to select them in bulk?
How can I select several documents at once to print later?
Can I select multiple PDF files to send via email at once?
I want to take notes during the meeting and save them to a specific folder. How can I do that?
Can I store some new diagrams I've made for my engineering project in a document?
I'm organizing a corporate event and need multiple taxis for guests arriving at the same time; can you facilitate this?
Can you take care of booking a taxi for my kids’ school pick up today?
I'd like to visit a well-known art gallery. Please show me where I can find one nearby on the map.
What are the common causes of headaches? I need to understand why I might be having them.
What are the advantages of meditation for mental health?
Help me find the parental control settings. I need to adjust what my kids can access.
How can I manage my sound settings? I find it complicated!
I need to switch my mobile data on for a short time; how do I open those settings?
I need to troubleshoot my hotspot settings since my friends can't connect. Where do I go?
With all this focus on data privacy, how do I quickly switch to airplane mode?
I have low battery; I want to turn on airplane mode fast. How do I do that?
How can I ensure my device connects to Wi-Fi automatically if I'm near my home?
I need to reset my router; how can I prepare my Android for reconnection?
How do I navigate to the APN settings to add custom settings for my device?
I heard there are advanced APN settings that can improve my internet experience; can you take me there?
How can I remove a Bluetooth device that's no longer being used?
My Bluetooth audio is lagging, and I need to check for any updates. Where should I look?
Can you help me find the date settings on my phone? I can't seem to locate it.
My app needs me to set a specific date, but I can't find the date settings. Help me!
I have an app that requires my language to be set to Korean. How can I do that?
I can't find where to change the language settings on my phone. Can you open it for me?
Is there an option to enable predictive text for a different language? Where can I access that?
Can I customize the keyboard shortcuts? I want faster access to frequently used phrases.
Where can I configure my privacy settings to control app permissions?
I want to adjust my device’s PIN settings but can't seem to get the settings panel to open. What should I do?
I keep getting pop-ups asking for location access; how can I manage this in settings?
Can you show me how to adjust location settings so my ride-hailing app can locate me better?
I've been getting a lot of notifications about storage issues. How do I manage the storage settings?
I'm trying to clear up space because I'm not able to take photos anymore. Where can I check my storage?
I'm trying to find out how to format my memory card; can you help?
I found an amazing recipe and want to send it via SMS to my friend at 444-333-2222. Is that doable?
